review: We went for my brother's headache. Doctor helped us understand the underlying cause and explained all our questions very well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Genuine doctor ever seen.
Clear explanation on what we ask for.
Very kind and humble to visit.

I consulted dr rithvik Ramesh for my headache. he explained the reason and advised medicine and precaution . I'm very happy with the treatment.  the clinic is very well Maintained with selection of health books , which was very unique. highly recommend
The interaction was comforting, he was able to give reassurance about my situation and explain what might my condition be.

I had gone for my headache issue. The doctor suspected it to be migraine and prescribed medicines accordingly. I really appreciate the service he gave with patience and care. Would definitely recommend him for my friends and family
Excellent doctor . Very patient and kind. Clean space with polite staff. My neuro problem was handled very well
